name: the-store
description: VERB 		 | 		  PATH 		 |  	 DESCRIPTION ------------ | ------------- | ------------------- GET | /api/v1/fragrance/ | index of fragrance | GET | /api/v1/fragrance/:id | show page for selected fragrance | GET | /api/v1/fragrance/new | page to add fragrance | POST | /api/v1/fragrance/ | add a fragrance | GET | /api/v1/fragrance/:id/edit | page to edit a fragrance | PUT | /api/v1/fragrance/:id | edit/update a fragrance | DELETE | /api/v1/fragrance/:id | delete a fragrance |
